descript.abstract: Dataset delineating boundaries of the Missouri State Senate Apportionment Plan 2012 districts.
descript.purpose: Dataset delineating boundaries of the Missouri State Senate Apportionment Plan 2012 districts. This Missouri State Senate Apportionment Plan, filed with the Missouri Secretary of State’s Office on 3-12-2012, replaces the Missouri Supreme Court invalidated Senate Apportionment Plan filed with the Missouri Secretary of State’s Office on 12-9-2011which superseded the rescinded Senate Apportionment Plan filed with the Missouri Secretary of State Office on 11-30-2011.

idinfo.useconst: This Missouri State Senate Apportionment Plan, filed with the Missouri Secretary of State’s Office on 3-12-2012, replaces the Missouri Supreme Court invalidated Senate Apportionment Plan filed with the Missouri Secretary of State’s Office on 12-9-2011which superseded the rescinded Senate Apportionment Plan filed with the Missouri Secretary of State Office on 11-30-2011.

cntorgp.cntorg: Missouri Office of Administration, Division of Budget and Planning Redistricting Office
